Package library

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
library.Loan
public class Loan
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a loan of a book, with details about the loan and return dates, and the status of the loan.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Loan​(int id, java.lang.String identifier, java.util.Date dateLoan, java.util.Date plannedDateBack, java.util.Date effectiveDateBack, boolean returned, boolean late)

    Constructs a new Loan object with the specified details including the customer ID.
    Loan​(java.lang.String identifier)
    Constructs a new Loan object with the specified identifier.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getCustomerId()
    Returns the ID of the customer who made the loan.
    java.util.Date getDateLoan()
    Returns the date when the loan was made.

    Returns the unique ID of the loan.

    Returns the identifier of the book being loaned.

    Returns whether the loan is late.

    Returns the planned date for returning the loaned book.

    Returns whether the book has been returned.

    • Loan

      public Loan​(java.lang.String identifier)
      Constructs a new Loan object with the specified identifier.

    • Loan

      public Loan​(int id, java.lang.String identifier, java.util.Date dateLoan, java.util.Date plannedDateBack, java.util.Date effectiveDateBack, boolean returned, boolean late)
      Constructs a new Loan object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the loan
      identifier - the identifier of the book being loaned
      dateLoan - the date when the loan was made
      plannedDateBack - the planned date for returning the loaned book
      effectiveDateBack - the actual date when the book was returned
      returned - indicates if the book has been returned
      late - indicates if the loan is late

    • Loan

      public Loan​(int id, java.lang.String identifier, java.util.Date dateLoan, java.util.Date plannedDateBack, java.util.Date effectiveDateBack, boolean returned, boolean late, int customerId)
      Constructs a new Loan object with the specified details including the customer ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the loan
      identifier - the identifier of the book being loaned
      dateLoan - the date when the loan was made
      plannedDateBack - the planned date for returning the loaned book
      effectiveDateBack - the actual date when the book was returned
      returned - indicates if the book has been returned
      late - indicates if the loan is late
      customerId - the ID of the customer who made the loan
